name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.149.0
- Added 3 new cards: Armored Zombie, Molten Zombie, Red Eyes Zombie
- Added 1 new Relic: Gift of Anubis
- All relics now have different art
- Removed The Servant and Slimebound dependencies
- Replay the Spire and Conspire are now optional dependencies
- Added Dragon keyword. Several cards do not trigger the dragon Tribute effect yet.
- Added Mystical keyword
- Dragons are now labeled in the card text
- Added Resummon keyword and some associated mechanics/logic
- Various balancing adjustments
- Added Light Orb from RTS into random orb pool
- Removed Summoned Skull and 1 copy of Castle Walls from the starting deck
- Token summons now place the proper named tokens in the summons list



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
